document.forum_title: Latest World News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Iran calls Russia 'ungentlemanly' for publicizing use of Iranian bases
document.topic_text: Iran calls Russia 'ungentlemanly' for publicizing use of Iranian bases Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 17 minutes ago ) Iran's defence minister is chastising Russia, saying Moscow's announcement on using Iranian bases for attacks on Syrian militants was "kind of show off and ungentlemanly." A U.S. State Department official says Russia's use of an Iranian air base to carry out military strikes in Syria is "unfortunate but no surprising." Rough Cut (no reporter narration). Recent related news TEHRAN, Iran (AP) — Iran’s defense minister is chastising Russia, saying Moscow’s announcement on using Iranian bases for attacks on Syrian militants was... Seattle Times
